title: Rito fix your bloody game
body:
Instead of adding a gazzilion updates and changes, how about you actually make sure your game works the way it is now, before you start fucking around with updates. This is the second time I've been placed into low priority queue due to an error in the loading screen causing my fair old computer to freeze

Anyone else getting this cause it is really starting to piss me off

replies.body: You want riot to fix your old computer?
Brah you just went full retard!
